import React from 'react' import { Fragment } from 'react' import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { XMarkIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' export const QuickView = ({ product, open, setOpen }) => { return (
{product.image ? : ''}

{product.name}

Product information

${product.price}



{product.description}
) }
